attributes.action: Force MP’s to vote For BREXIT if this was majority vote in their constituencies
attributes.background: We are now aware that many MP’s are voting in the BREXIT negotiations against the will of their constituents. This cannot be allowed and should not be tolerated. MP’s who cannot accept this Democratic Vote should be made to step down.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
